channel.title: Message on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client
channel.description: Recent content in Message on Documentation of php-simple-kafka-client

item.title: getErrorString
item.description: Description public function getErrorString(): string {} Get error string of the message Example echo $message->getErrorString();

item.title: Properties
item.description: Description The message object’s data can be accessed by it’s public properties err the error code (or in case of success RD_KAFKA_RESP_ERR_NO_ERROR) topic_name topic name of message partition partition number of message payload payload of the message len length of the payload key key of the message offset offset of the message headers headers of the message (or null)
